lokaye aashwadajanaka menma ihalama sancharaka aakarshanayak sahitha ratawal paha atharata shri lankawa pamina thibe.eksath rajadhaniye supa්rakata ‘‘helo’’ sangarawa sidukala samikshanayakadi me bawa anawaranaya wi atha.ee anuwa me wasare lowa wadathma aashwadajanaka sancharaka gamanantha 5 atharata sha්ri lankawa ekkara thibena athara ‘‘helo’’ sangarawa siya chayarupa pela atharata sha්ri lankawe kandukaraye the wathu aashritha chayarupa pelak ekkara athayi wartha weyi.eeta amatharawa pinnawala ali anathagaraya, polonnaruwe aithihasika natambaun saha unawatuna werala thiraya pilibanda da ehi wishesha sthanayak himiwa thibe.sha්ri lankawe wana sathun, sanskruthika dayada saha manaram darshana sancharakayan wisin aniwaryayen athwindiya yuthu bawata suprakata helo sangarawa penwa deyi.shri lankawata amatharawa thayilanthaya, kroeeshiyawa, maladiwayina saha sanginiya diwayina anekuth aashwadajanaka sancharaka gamanantha lesa namkara atha..
punaruthpaththiya widyathmakawa aththaya kiyala paryeshanaya karana, ehi prathipala oppu kerena, thanata lokaya awith.
taga: jayagrahana, nirmana, wishesha dina,
